commit-message: Add a Maven 2 Build. Unfortunately it is currently impossible to skip the download with M2. I've filed a bug with them and will hopefully hear back soon. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/modules/XmlSchema@379574 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Changed the serialization from static to instance driven. 2. Fixed the serializer to have proper extension serialization calls 3. Added a test case to check the extension attributes git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@523933 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

1. Added a test case for custom element serialization 2. Changed some of the comments and method names so that things make sense git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@523937 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Better test for DOM3 interfaces. works on both IBM and Sun 1.4 JDK's git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@612497 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
some defensive code to prevent NPE (and fix build break) git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@613213 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

A very large set of changes to comply with checkstyle, PMD, and Java 1.5. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@727246 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

More work on things-with-names. Distinguish the 'name on the wire' of attributes and elements from the 'QName in the collection'. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@732417 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

Fix eclipse setup Workaround "bug" in command line javac (works fine in eclipse javac) git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@732447 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
Move the <element> to use the new ref discipline. git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@732522 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
WSCOMMONS-458 Just the first of many installments.git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/webservices/commons/trunk/modules/XmlSchema@762586 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
